Claim: "A man is painting letters onto a round stand-up sign."
Implication: "A woman is writing on a napkin and showing it to her friend."
Referring expressions: A man, letters, round stand-up sign.  Woman, napkin, friend
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsPainting(a,b) and IsRound(c) and IsStandUp(c))))) -> (exists f (exists e (exists d (IsWriting(d,e) and IsShowing(d,f)))))
